main event: An unidentified object was sighted on radar near Congaree AFB, South Carolina on December 4, 1952, with speed estimates varying between 400 to 6,000 mph.
interesting points: The radar operator first observed the object moving westerly at approximately 800 knots,The object flared up and slowed down to 400-500 knots before accelerating again to around 800 knots,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes and ended with the object disappearing from radar at a range of 99 miles, Multiple operators involved in the sighting considered reliable and experienced, The incident is classified as unknown pending further meteorological investigation.
sighted object: an unidentified object moving at high speeds
witness description: Radar operators at Congaree AFB with 2-5 years of experience in radar operations
